    description:
      "Add a touch of elegance to your look with our beautiful Braided wigs! With a wide selection of colors and styles to choose from, you'll always look your best with our high-quality Braided wigs. Whether you're looking for a curly or straight wig, a long or short one, we've got you covered.",

  {

    description:
      "Stand out from the crowd with our stunning Colored wigs! Our high-quality wigs come in a range of beautiful colors and styles, so you can always find the perfect one for any occasion. Whether you want a curly or straight wig, a long or short one, we've got you covered.",

  {

    description:
      "Experience the ultimate in style and luxury with our Human hair wigs! Made with only the finest quality hair, our wigs come in a variety of colors and styles to suit your unique personality and taste. Whether you're looking for a curly or straight wig, a long or short one, we've got you covered.",

  {
